title: Spanish Countryside Glamour 30 Minutes from Marbella with Wellness Club & Golf Course
description:
Step into true SO/ splendour at this uber-chic retreat tucked away in the Andalusian countryside in sunny Costa del Sol. Redefining laidback luxury, this sprawling resort invites you to indulge - succumb to tranquillity at the spa and wellness club with eight meditative treatment rooms, cryotherapy and flotation facilities, hydrotherapy pools and steam rooms.

Practice your putt at the 18-hole golf course, splash into two sparkling pools and feel your best at the fitness centre with a resident physiotherapist to guide you. When hunger strikes, four exceptional bars and restaurants are sure to please, with everything from Andalusian fare from a Michelin-recognised chef, to expertly grilled meat paired with a live DJ or traditional tapas and cocktails.
location_description: SO/ Sotogrande Spa And Golf Resort Hotel
offer_address: Av. Almenara S/N, Sotogrande 11310, San Roque, Cadiz, Spain
